thread.section_title: California Delicious Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of California Delicious | californiadelicious.com
thread.title: Wendi B.
thread.title_full: California Delicious reviewed by Wendi B.

author: Wendi B.
title: Wendi B.
text: I've ordered three gift baskets in the last two weeks. The site is easy to use, prices are affordable and customer service is very responsive (I had to make an address change last minute - no problems). My recipients love their baskets. I will definitely order again!
